files.name: main.py
files.content:
numberOne=int(input("Enter a number (0 to exit):"))
factorial=numberOne

while(numberOne< 0):
    print('Error: Must be greater than 0')
    numberOne=int(input("Enter a number (0 to exit):"))
if(numberOne==0):
    print("Done.")

counter=numberOne
factorial=numberOne
while (counter > 1):
    print(factorial, "x", counter-1 )
    factorial=factorial*(counter-1)
    counter=counter-1

if(numberOne>0):
    print(numberOne, "factorial is", factorial)
